mapper.insert: INSERT INTO planday_attractions (planday_id, attraction_id, time, content) VALUES (#{plandayId}, #{attractionId}, #{time}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE planday_attractions SET attraction_id = #{attractionId}, time = #{time}, content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE planday_attractions SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT pda.*, a.title as attractionTitle, a.latitude as latitude, a.longitude as longitude, a.addr1 as addr1 FROM planday_attractions pda LEFT JOIN attractions a ON pda.attraction_id = a.id WHERE pda.id = #{id} AND pda.deleted_at IS NULL
